RegistryNameCheckRequest.description: A request to check whether a container registry name is available.

name.description: The name of the container registry.

type.description: The resource type of the container registry. This field must be set to "Microsoft.ContainerRegistry/registries".

RegistryNameStatus.description: The result of a request to check the availability of a container registry name.

nameAvailable.description: The value that indicates whether the name is available.

reason.description: If any, the reason that the name is not available.

message.description: If any, the error message that provides more detail for the reason that the name is not available.

OperationListResult.description: The result of a request to list container registry operations.

value.description: The list of container registry operations. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of operations.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of container registry operations.

OperationDefinition.description: The definition of a container registry operation.

display.description: The display information for the container registry operation.

OperationDisplayDefinition.description: The display information for a container registry operation.

resource.description: The resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: The operation that users can perform.

Registry.description: An object that represents a container registry.

sku.description: The SKU of the container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the container registry.

Sku.description: The SKU of a container registry.

name.description: The SKU name of the the container registry. Required for registry creation. Allowed value: Basic.

tier.description: The SKU tier based on the SKU name.

RegistryProperties.description: The properties of a container registry.

loginServer.description: The URL that can be used to log into the container registry.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the container registry in ISO8601 format.

provisioningState.description: The status of the container registry at the time the operation was called.

adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled. This value is false by default.

storageAccount.description: The properties of the storage account for the container registry.

StorageAccountProperties.description: The properties of a storage account for a container registry.

name.description: The name of the storage account.

RegistryCreateParameters.description: The parameters for creating a container registry.

tags.description: The tags for the container registry.

location.description: The location of the container registry. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

sku.description: The SKU of the container registry.

properties.description: The properties that the container registry will be created with.

RegistryPropertiesCreateParameters.description: The parameters for creating the properties of a container registry.

adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled. This value is false by default.

storageAccount.description: The parameters of a storage account for the container registry. If specified, the storage account must be in the same physical location as the container registry.

StorageAccountParameters.description: The parameters of a storage account for a container registry.

name.description: The name of the storage account.

accessKey.description: The access key to the storage account.

RegistryUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a container registry.

tags.description: The tags for the container registry.

properties.description: The properties that the container registry will be updated with.

RegistryPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a container registry.

adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled. This value is false by default.

storageAccount.description: The parameters of a storage account for the container registry. If specified, the storage account must be in the same physical location as the container registry.

RegistryListResult.description: The result of a request to list container registries.

value.description: The list of container registries. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of container registries.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of container registries.

RegistryListCredentialsResult.description: The response from the ListCredentials operation.

username.description: The username for a container registry.

passwords.description: The list of passwords for a container registry.

RegistryPassword.description: The login password for the container registry.

RegenerateCredentialParameters.description: The parameters used to regenerate the login credential.

name.description: Specifies name of the password which should be regenerated -- password or password2.
